description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The erection of a rear dormer roof extension with 3no front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 17 (Levels) of planning permission 21/02109/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

The submitted existing front elevation does not corelate with the existing floor plan.Please provide a copy of existing front elevation at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work. Although the inclusion of a scale bar is not mandatory, it is encouraged.
